Content:: Ramai Ram (1 January 1944 – 14 July 2022) was an Indian politician from VIP[1] and was nine times MLA from Bochahan constituency in Bihar. Ramai Ram was born to Kisuni Ram at Muzaffarpur, Bihar into a Dalit family.[2][3] His daughter, Geeta Kumari was appointed a member of the State Transport Authority when he was Transport Minister and later she became MLC from Bihar.[4] His other daughter, Rekha Devi was also MLC in Bihar. He died at Medanta Hospital in Kankarbagh, Patna on 14 July 2022 at the age of 78.[5][6] Ramai Ram once used to be known as right-hand of Lalu Prasad Yadav.[citation needed]
Title: Ramai Ram - Wikipedia
